name: A4-SS
description:
To find a solution to the b-virus Dr.  Baglintcsky places the virus on the A4-SS SAI-borg he created, but suddenly, SpyWare eventually writes the famous CAVE ADVENTURE game to the computer. Dr. knows that this game is not a game he knows at all, and the only way to find the answer is to play the game.

CONTROL

Movement - WASD or Arrow keys

-Attack - C or K or Mouse 0

-Pause Menu - P

-Restart- R

-Reset Game - F4 + R (note if you press F4, save file will be deleted)

-Jump - Space (also double jump)

-You can press S and drop down white tiles

-You can wall jump

Developed for Github Game Off 2021.

Developed by Abbasov Samir.

I thank every one of you for every part I use in the game.
